Gold.en: An attack that may lower ATTACK.

Silver.en: An attack that may lower ATTACK.

Crystal.en: An attack that may lower ATTACK.

Ruby.en: Fires a rainbow-colored beam that may lower ATTACK.

Sapphire.en: Fires a rainbow-colored beam that may lower ATTACK.

Emerald.en: Fires a rainbow-colored beam that may lower ATTACK.

FireRed.en: A rainbow-colored attack beam. It may lower the foe’s ATTACK stat.
FireRed.de: Regenbogenfarbener Strahl, der evtl. den ANGR.-Wert senkt.

LeafGreen.en: A rainbow-colored attack beam. It may lower the foe’s ATTACK stat.
LeafGreen.de: Regenbogenfarbener Strahl, der evtl. den ANGR.-Wert senkt.

Diamond.en: The foe is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. It may also lower the target’s Attack stat.
Diamond.de: Regenbogenfarbener Strahl, der eventuell den Angriffs-Wert des Gegners senkt.
